name: Learning in a simple biological system: a pilot study of classical conditioning of human macrophages in vitro
description: Learning in a simple biological system: a pilot study of classical conditioning of human macrophages in vitro
citation: Nilsonne, G., Appelgren, A., Axelsson, J. et al. Learning in a simple biological system: a pilot study of classical conditioning of human macrophages in vitro. Behav Brain Funct 7, 47 (2011).

variableMeasured.name: group
variableMeasured.description: The type of stimulus received. Group 1: training=CS+UCS - evocation=CS. Group 2: training=CS+UCS - evocation=none. Group 3: training=CS - evocation=none. Group 4: training=CS - evocation=CS. Group 5: training=UCS - evocation=none. Group 6: training=UCS - evocation=CS. Group 7: training=none - evocation=none.

variableMeasured.name: donor_strand
variableMeasured.description: The donor of the macrophages id and strand number combined.

variableMeasured.name: measurement
variableMeasured.description: The measurement number for a given combination of donor/strand and group

variableMeasured.name: il6_secretion_abs
variableMeasured.description: The measured absolute secretion of IL-6 in pg/ml.

variableMeasured.name: il6_secretion_rel
variableMeasured.description: The measured relative secretion of IL-6 in fold change.
